Link Building Tool

Link Building Tool

Discover backlink prospects, implement outreach campaigns, and track new links all within Semrush.

Try It Free
Discover Your Website’s Best Link Building Prospects and Conduct Outreach
Discover new link building opportunities, gather contact information on target websites, reach out to them, and follow your campaign progress.
Find the Best Fits for Your Outreach

Review all the domains suitable for your link building campaign, sort by their overall rating, and see which are sending similar backlinks to your rivals’ websites.

Try It Free
Track Your Work in Progress

Set up your email outreach and track your progress all within the tool. Just connect your email account to reach out to backlink prospects and read replies directly from the tool.

Try It Free
Monitor the Results

Track your link building progress with an intuitive chart. You’ll be able to see which backlinks are active, broken, lost, or rejected.

Try It Free
How the Semrush Link Building Tool Helps Your SEO

Explore and discover a myriad of backlink opportunities perfect for your site. Conduct outreach and build new links that will help your domain’s authority and SEO.

Pick the Best Websites to Connect with

Determine the value of each link prospect by checking its rating, which includes additional information for each domain. Move the best prospects to your "In Progress" list to start your outreach.

Reach Out and Build New Backlinks

Connect your Gmail account and contact domain owners directly from Semrush. Use customizable email templates for your outreach strategies and stay updated on them.

Keep an Eye on the Results

Track your outreach efforts. If you find lost or broken backlinks, move them back to your "In Progress" list and instantly contact your link partners to fix them. Easily change the referring URL you'd like to track.

Discover backlink prospects. Craft your outreach strategies. Track progress.
